doc.field: Letters from Calver to Oscar Theodore Barck, Sr. re: their activities and work of the NYHS Field Exploration Committee on various Revolutionary War and War of 1812 military sites; and letters written by Calver during his trip to Palestine to excavate Crusader castle of Montfort for The Metropolitan Museum of Art
